segment.source: Windows 10 includes the following new policies for management, in addition to policies that were available for Windows 8.1 and Windows Phone 8.1.
segment.target: Windows 10 includes the following new policies for management, in addition to policies that were available for Windows 8.1 and Windows Phone 8.1.

segment.source: Windows 10 includes the following new policies for management, in addition to policies that were available for Windows 8.1 and Windows Phone 8.1.
segment.target: Windows 10 includes the following new policies for management, in addition to policies that were available for Windows 8.1 and Windows Phone 8.1.

segment.source: Download the complete set of Administrative Template (.admx) files for Windows 10.
segment.target: Download the complete set of Administrative Template (.admx) files for Windows 10.

segment.source: There are some new policy settings in Group Policy for devices running Windows 10 , such as:
segment.target: There are some new policy settings in Group Policy for devices running Windows 10 , such as:

segment.source: Universal Windows app settings, such as:
segment.target: Universal Windows app settings, such as:

segment.source: Disable deployment of Windows Store apps to non-system volumes
segment.target: Disable deployment of Windows Store apps to non-system volumes

segment.source: Restrict users' application data to always stay on the system volume
segment.target: Restrict users' application data to always stay on the system volume

segment.source: Allow applications to share app data between users
segment.target: Allow applications to share app data between users

segment.source: Start screen and Start menu layout
segment.target: Start screen and Start menu layout

segment.source: Consumer experiences, such as suggested apps in Start and app tiles from Microsoft dynamically inserted in the default Start menu
segment.target: Consumer experiences, such as suggested apps in Start and app tiles from Microsoft dynamically inserted in the default Start menu

segment.source: For a spreadsheet of Group Policy settings included in Windows, see Group Policy Settings Reference for Windows and Windows Server.
segment.target: For a spreadsheet of Group Policy settings included in Windows, see Group Policy Settings Reference for Windows and Windows Server.

segment.source: Mobile device management (MDM) for Windows 10 Pro, Windows 10 Enterprise, Windows 10 Education, and Windows 10 Mobile includes settings from Windows Phone 8.1, plus new or enhanced settings for Windows 10, such as:
segment.target: Mobile device management (MDM) for Windows 10 Pro, Windows 10 Enterprise, Windows 10 Education, and Windows 10 Mobile includes settings from Windows Phone 8.1, plus new or enhanced settings for Windows 10, such as:

segment.source: Defender (Windows 10 Pro, Windows 10 Enterprise, and Windows 10 Education only)
segment.target: Defender (Windows 10 Pro, Windows 10 Enterprise, and Windows 10 Education only)

segment.source: Kiosk mode, start screen, start menu layout
segment.target: Kiosk mode, start screen, start menu layout

segment.source: Consumer experiences, such as suggested apps in Start and app tiles from Microsoft dynamically inserted in the default Start menu
segment.target: Consumer experiences, such as suggested apps in Start and app tiles from Microsoft dynamically inserted in the default Start menu

segment.source: If you use Microsoft Intune for MDM, you can configure custom policies to deploy Open Mobile Alliance Uniform Resource Identifier (OMA-URI) settings that can be used to control features on Windows 10.
segment.target: If you use Microsoft Intune for MDM, you can configure custom policies to deploy Open Mobile Alliance Uniform Resource Identifier (OMA-URI) settings that can be used to control features on Windows 10.

segment.source: For a list of OMA-URI settings, see Custom URI settings for Windows 10 devices.
segment.target: For a list of OMA-URI settings, see Custom URI settings for Windows 10 devices.

segment.source: For more information, see the ActiveSync configuration service provider technical reference.
segment.target: For more information, see the ActiveSync configuration service provider technical reference.

segment.source: Changes to Group Policy settings for Start in Windows 10
segment.target: Changes to Group Policy settings for Start in Windows 10
